title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the lawsuit brought forth by former head coach Brian Flores and what this says about the current hiring practices in the NFL. He believes Jim Harbaugh is ready to make his return to the NFL after reaching his peak at Michigan this past season. He also addresses the Dolphins owner allegedly offering bonus money to Flores if the team lost games in order to gain a better draft position. Plus, Saints LB Demario Davis joins the show to share who he thinks could be their new head coach in New Orleans and if the NFL needs to address the lack of diversity among its head coaches.
